attributes.action: not recognise the Dec 07 PRESIDENTIAL Election results in Kenya and insist that a new election is held by end April 2007.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kenya is a democratic country and voters elected a new breed of MPs to represent them, evicting many old and distrusted faces.  

However the results of the presidential elections are publicly denounced by all except the self proclaimed winner. 

Kenya needs
peace from a promised new and quick election, 
truth and justice about all the historical and recent scandals (MP sudden deaths, corruption) 
and adjustments in land assignment (distribution by political cronyism)for a better future.

Whilst the international community takes it's time to decide about imposing sanctions and restrictions, international individuals have and already cancelled most of their travel plans to Kenya for the year.  

A new, fair and monitored Presidential election should be insisted upon by the government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
